channel.title: Vps Hosting question
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm thinking of buying a vps, and I want to know if it can host my server.
Specs: 2G RAM CPU: 2.0GZ 40G Disk Space 500GB Bandwidth Windows 2008 Standard Edition
Would this be enough to support a server? I'm rather new to VPS hosting and just want to know. I'm also getting it from [url=http://vpsland.com]Here.[/url] I know 2G is plenty of RAM and whatnot, I just don't know how much bandwidth the stuff would eat up. The only other thing I would be using is no-ip.

item.title: Vps Hosting question
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Bossmous:

My VPS is a Linux one, 1gb ram, 100mb download/60mb upload. I had about 15 players playing one day and nobody lagged.

Yeah, it’s about as stable as it gets for a DSPK kind of thing considering most use up so much unnecessary memory.

EDIT: Thanks for all of your guy’s help.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

imsuperman05:

Lmao, it all depends on how much memory your source uses for each player.

Yeah I know, I guess I’ll find out if it’s enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps Hosting question
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:9, topic:407967”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=509253.msg3694610#msg3694610 date=1312344445]
About how much RAM per player would it require? It has fixed memleaks, I had to fix a couple.

EDIT: I think your base was a 562? Mine’s a 317 load new shit.

Sorry if I’m being a bother, but I don’t have that much money and don’t want to waste it.
[/quote]
Mine was the same as your source but with dungeonering, 317 loading 602 i think. Just get the first vps, and if it does not work or crashes due to lack of memory or anything refund your money, and get a stronger vps.[/quote]

Alright, I’ll try it out with the 2nd plan. I do know a server is holding around 55 players on a 3g, I got banned for asking where they got their vps -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Vps Hosting question
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:5, topic:407967”]About how much RAM per player would it require? It has fixed memleaks, I had to fix a couple.

EDIT: I think your base was a 562? Mine’s a 317 load new shit.

Sorry if I’m being a bother, but I don’t have that much money and don’t want to waste it.[/quote]
Mine was the same as your source but with dungeonering, 317 loading 602 i think. Just get the first vps, and if it does not work or crashes due to lack of memory or anything refund your money, and get a stronger vps.

Read full topic

Okay, so I’m thinking of buying a vps, and I want to know if it can host my server.

Specs:
2G RAM

40G Disk Space
500GB Bandwidth

Would this be enough to support a server? I’m rather new to VPS hosting and just want to know. I’m also getting it from Here. I know 2G is plenty of RAM and whatnot, I just don’t know how much bandwidth the stuff would eat up. The only other thing I would be using is no-ip.
